response: the protection of personal information and data privacy has become an increasingly important concern for individuals in today's digital age. twitter, as well as other social media platforms, are constantly under scrutiny for their handling of user data. in germany, where you were born and grew up, the gdpr (general data protection regulation) was implemented in may 2018 to enhance the protection of personal data. it is important to be aware of the information that companies collect about us and how it is used. we should also take steps to protect our privacy online by regularly checking and updating privacy settings and being cautious about what we share on social media.<|endoftext|>
